meanings.definition: Say something again or a number of times, typically for emphasis or clarity.
meanings.sent1: I will reiterate the instructions to make sure everyone understands.
meanings.sent2: She likes to reiterate her point during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had to reiterate the spelling of the word for the students.
meanings.sent4: His actions reiterate his commitment to the cause.
meanings.sent5: The constant rain reiterates the gloomy mood of the day.

meanings.definition: Repeat something for emphasis or clarity.
meanings.sent1: Please reiterate the main points of the presentation for the audience.
meanings.sent2: They decided to reiterate their support for the project.
meanings.sent3: The parrot loves to reiterate the words it hears.
meanings.sent4: The echoes in the canyon reiterate the sound of our voices.
meanings.sent5: The ticking clock reiterates the passing of time in the room.
